heading.title: The {0} and digital asset products.
heading.subtitle: Secure, modular SaaS to launch and scale exchanges, wallets, and high-{0}volume digital products without rebuilding your stack.

about.title: About Genloft
about.sectionDescription: GENLOFT is an infrastructure - first SaaS platform for building, securing, and operating trading platforms, digital asset products, and ambitious online services.
about.sectionSubDescription: We combine AI-driven generation with modular backend tools, zero-trust access, and compliance-ready workflows – so product teams in finance and digital assets can move fast without losing control.

capabilities.title: Our Capabilities
capabilities.sectionDescription: Activate only what you need - each capability is modular and integrates with the core platform.

ai_generated_pages.title: AI-Generated Pages
ai_generated_pages.description: Smart layouts from your brief, refined by humans – ideal for landing flows, funnels, and product pages.

custom_ui_ux_sites.title: Custom UI/UX Sites
custom_ui_ux_sites.description: Brand-aligned marketing and app surfaces, shipped in your stack with performance and accessibility in mind.

modular_page_engine.title: Modular Page Engine
modular_page_engine.description: Multi-step funnels, forms, routing, and tracking - ready for high-volume traffic and rapid iteration.

security_compliance.title: Security & Compliance
security_compliance.description: Zero-trust access, audit logs, and monitoring for sensitive data and regulated financial products.

crm_form_routing.title: CRM & Form Routing
crm_form_routing.description: Lead capture, tagging, sources, and webhook flows for acquisition, partner programs, and ops teams.

data_analytics_layer.title: Data & Analytics Layer
data_analytics_layer.description: Attribution, dashboards, and full visibility into performance, cohorts, and key business events.

bigCard.label: Core Services
bigCard.title: Flexible modular platform for next-level digital infrastructure - from trading flows and customer onboarding to secure dashboards and data-heavy applications.
bigCard.caption: Design, optimize, scale, and secure

scale.title: Built for scale. Trusted where structure matters.
scale.sectionKey: Built for scale. Trusted where structure matters.
scale.sectionDescription: We empower trading teams, digital asset platforms, and system-critical businesses with modular infrastructure, zero-trust security, and autonomous deployment.

cta.description: Submit a request — we’ll show you how to launch without a team

solutions.title: Genloft Solutions
solutions.sectionDescription: A full-stack toolkit to build, launch, and scale product funnels – fast, secure, and optimized for high-risk and high-volume environments.
solutions.sectionSubDescription: From AI-powered page generation and campaign setup to backend logic, CRM flows, and infrastructure – GENLOFT delivers modular, scalable solutions for trading platforms, wallets, and modern SaaS teams.
solutions.highlightText: Scale from a single page to a fully distributed cloud architecture - without changing your base setup.

saas.title: SaaS Modules
saas.sectionDescription: GENLOFT is a secure-by-default platform that combines landing automation, CRM, deployment control, and privacy-first infrastructure for trading, finance, and digital product teams.
saas.sectionSubDescription: Whether you're a growth team, an agency, or a business working in a restricted environment — GENLOFT gives you a scalable and autonomous digital base.

footer.gdprText: GENLOFT stores EU data in EU regions and provides audit‑ready logs for compliance.

bar.title: Cookie files
bar.description: Our website uses cookies, including those from web analytics services. By using the website, you consent to the processing of your personal data using cookies. For more information about the processing of personal data, please see our Privacy Policy.

forms.consent: By clicking the “Submit” button, you consent to the processing of your personal data.
forms.checkConsent: You should agree to our terms and conditions.
